# WEAPON::GIVE_LOADOUT_TO_PED

## Summary
Give the specified ped the set of weapons defined in the specified loadout

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **LOADOUT_TYPE** loadOut

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Gives the specified loadout to the specified ped. 
Loadouts are defined in common.rpf\data\ai\loadouts.meta
